nodes.text: @OrlandoJS84 😂😂😂😂  I mean! Watch the first episode and tell me what you think

@OrlandoJS84 This season is about police brutality which I am tired of. Kevin’s spiraling out of control and Keisha’s contemplating between keeping the baby & giving it away. The first episode was okay. I can see where it’s heading and I don’t know if I’m gonna like it
Really contemplating if i wanna invest my time into watching this season of The Chi. @TheCutestWeirdo what you think is it worth it?
